  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103110</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103110</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Déplacement de la lumière à travers des substances opaques et  translucides</string>
            <string language="en">Light travelling through opaque and translucent substances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helles Reisen durch die undurchlässigen und 
lichtdurchlässigen Substanzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Viajar claro através das substâncias opacas e 
translúcidas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attraversare chiaro through le sostanze opache e 
traslucide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφρύ ταξίδι μέσω των αδιαφανών και διαφανών ουσιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El viajar ligero a través de sustancias opacas y 
translúcidas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Première sur deux illustrations montrant la trajectoire de la lumière à travers différentes substances. Montrée ici est l'ombre d'une substance opaque (balle de squash) sur une substance translucide (écran de verre).</string>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations showing passage of light through different substances. Shown here is the shadow of an opaque substance (squashball) on a translucent substance  (glass screen).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">verre</string>
            <string language="en">glass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">opaque</string>
            <string language="en">opaque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ombre</string>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">balle de squash</string>
            <string language="en">squashball</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">translucide</string>
            <string language="en">translucent</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die Durchgang des 
Lichtes durch unterschiedliche Substanzen zeigen. Hier gezeigt 
der Schatten einer undurchlässigen Substanz (squashball) auf einer 
lichtdurchlässigen Substanz (Glasbildschirm).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostram a
passagem da luz através das substâncias diferentes. É 
mostrada aqui a sombra de uma substância opaca (squashball) em uma 
substância translúcida (tela de vidro).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che mostrano 
passaggio di luce attraverso le sostanze differenti. È indicata
qui l'ombra di una sostanza opaca (squashball) su una sostanza 
traslucida (schermo di vetro).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν μετάβαση του 
φωτός μέσω των διαφορετικών ουσιών. Εμφανισμένη εδώ είναι
η σκιά μιας αδιαφανούς ουσίας (squashball) σε μια διαφανή 
ουσία (οθόνη γυαλιού).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestran el paso 
de la luz a través de diversas sustancias. Se muestra aquí la 
sombra de una sustancia opaca (squashball) en una sustancia 
translúcida (pantalla de cristal).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">undurchlässig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schatten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">squashball</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">lichtdurchlässig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vidro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">opaco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sombra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">squashball</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">translúcido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vetro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">opaco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ombra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">squashball</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">traslucido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γυαλί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αδιαφανής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σκιά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">squashball</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
